text: Bhushan Patil (born 18 November 1985) is an Indian actor who appears in Marathi filmshttp://www.marathidhamaal.com/news/celebrity-diary-bhushan- patilhttp://dreamerspr.com/project/bhushan-patil/ ==Career== Bhushan Patil known as the most versatile and promising fresh face of Marathi Film industry, he also known as Handsome hunk of M-Townhttp://dreamerspr.com/project/bhushan- patil/http://www.gomolo.com/news-mtown-handsome-hunk-bhushan-patil-dons-a- different-look-in-bernie/29043 Bhushan’s debut happened with the Balaji Telefilms Reality Show Kaun Jitega Bollywood Ka Ticket. Bhushan Patil was the winner of ETV Marathi reality show ‘Perfect Bachelor’http://archive.indianexpress.com/news/the-single-winner/928853/ Bhushan Patil made his film debut with Marathi Film Olakh My Identity (2015) He has also done the music album with Sonu Kakkar, song – Akhiyan Nu Rehn De https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=akiqJP81q78 and Isheta Sarckar – Pyaar Ka Hangoverhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2JsfNaDCfIY ==Films== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !!
